trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedRequest" /> class passes extended LDAP operations to the server.
trans-unit.target: A classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedRequest" /> passa operações de LDAP estendidas para o servidor.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedRequest.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedRequest" /> class.
trans-unit.target: O construtor <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedRequest.#ctor" /> cria uma instância da classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedRequest" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedRequest.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedRequest" /> class.
trans-unit.target: O construtor <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedRequest.#ctor" /> cria uma instância da classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedRequest" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedRequest.#ctor(System.String)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedRequest" /> class using the specified name.
trans-unit.target: O construtor <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedRequest.#ctor(System.String)" /> cria uma instância da classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedRequest" /> usando o nome especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedRequest.#ctor(System.String,System.Byte[])" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedRequest" /> class using the specified name and value.
trans-unit.target: O construtor <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedRequest.#ctor(System.String,System.Byte[])" /> cria uma instância da classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedRequest" /> usando o nome e o valor especificados.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedRequest.RequestName" /> property contains the request name.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedRequest.RequestName" /> contém o nome da solicitação.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedRequest.RequestValue" /> property contains the value of the request.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedRequest.RequestValue" /> contém o valor da solicitação.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedRequest.ToXmlNode(System.Xml.XmlDocument)" /> method creates an XML node from the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" /> object.
trans-unit.target: O método <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedRequest.ToXmlNode(System.Xml.XmlDocument)" /> cria um nó XML com base no objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" /> especificado.
O tipo do objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> resultante.
